      • deleteNeededErrataCache

        public static int deleteNeededErrataCache(java.lang.Long sid,
                          java.lang.Long eid)
        Deletes record from NeededErrata cache table. If the Errata Id is null, all errata cache for the server will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        sid - Server Id
        eid - Errata Id
        Returns:
        number of rows affected.

      • deleteNeededErrataCache

        public static int deleteNeededErrataCache(java.lang.Long sid)
        Delete all records from NeededErrata cache for the server provided. errata cache for the server will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        sid - Server Id
        Returns:
        number of rows affected.

      • updateCacheForChannelsAsync

        public static void updateCacheForChannelsAsync(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> channelIdsToUpdate)
        Asynchronusly updates the errata caches for the channels passed in. Deletes the entire cache for All servers in the channel VERY INEFFICIENT
        Parameters:
        channelIdsToUpdate - - channel IDs (Long) that need their errata caches updated

      • updateCacheForChannelsAsync

        public static void updateCacheForChannelsAsync(java.util.Set<Channel> channelsToUpdate)
        Asynchronusly updates the errata caches for the channels passed in. Deletes the entire cache for All servers in the channel VERY INEFFICIENT
        Parameters:
        channelsToUpdate - - Channels that need their errata caches updated

      • insertCacheForChannelPackages

        public static void insertCacheForChannelPackages(java.lang.Long cid,
                                 java.lang.Long eid,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Long> pids)
        Insert the new cache entries for a list of packages
        Parameters:
        cid - the channel where packages were added to
        eid - the errata that 'pushed' these packages (can be null
        pids - the list of pids that were pushed.

        Delete errata cache entries for systems belonging to a certain channel
        Parameters:
        cid - the channel that the systems belong to
        eids - the errata to remove

        Delete errata cache entries for systems belonging to a certain channel
        Parameters:
        eid - the errata to remove
        pids - the packages to remove

      • updateErrataAndPackageCacheForChannel

        public static void updateErrataAndPackageCacheForChannel(java.lang.Long cid)
        Clear out and re-generate the entries in rhnServerNeededPackageCache and rhnServerNeededErrataCache tables by channel. Usefull if the set of errata or packages gets changed with a Channel
        Parameters:
        cid - - channel to update caches for.

                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Long> pids)
        Remove cache entries for particular packages usefull if you are removing packages from a channel
        Parameters:
        cid - the channel id
        pids - the package ids
